description.english: Complete the game in its entirety.

displayName.japanese: イッカクを完成させる

description.english: Find everything hidden in the Narhwals artwork.

description.german: Finden Sie alles, was in dem Narhwal Kunstwerk versteckt ist.
description.japanese: イッカクの作品に隠されたものをすべて探し出す。

description.schinese: 找到独角兽画作里的所有蜜蜂。
description.spanish: Encontraste todo lo que está escondido en la obra de arte Narhwals.
description.swedish: Hitta allt i det gömda Narhwals konstverket.
